QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Mount Hyjal!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Emissary Windsong at Nighthaven in Moonglade.$B$BOur brothers in the Cenarion Circle report that Deathwing's minions have launched a destructive offensive against the world tree and threaten to burn it to the ground!$B$BSpeak with Cenarion Emissary Jademoon in Stormwind Keep to gain entry into Moonglade.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance! Fight on, $g brother:sister;!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Cenarion Emissary Jademoon to secure transportation to Moonglade.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Emissary Windsong at Nighthaven in Moonglade.
QuestData.RewardText: We knew the Alliance would send help and not a moment too soon!
